HomePage.title: FATTOUSH
HomePage.subtitle: Authentic Lebanese cuisine in the heart of Geneva

spirit.title: The Fattoush Spirit
spirit.description: FATTOUSH celebrates the richness of Lebanese cuisine through authentic recipes, fresh products, and know-how passed down with passion.

specialties.title: Our Specialties
specialties.description: Discover the flavors of the Levant

reservation.title: Book your table in a few clicks

hummus.name: Hummus
hummus.desc: Chickpea puree, sesame cream, lemon, olive oil

moutabal.name: Moutabal
moutabal.desc: Smoked eggplant caviar, sesame cream, pomegranate

tabbouleh.name: Tabbouleh
tabbouleh.desc: Parsley, mint, tomatoes, onions, bulgur, lemon, olive oil

fattoush.name: Fattoush
fattoush.desc: Mixed salad, toasted Lebanese bread, sumac, pomegranate molasses

falafel.name: Falafel
falafel.desc: Crispy chickpea and fava bean patties, tarator sauce

kibbeh.name: Kibbeh
kibbeh.desc: Meat and bulgur balls stuffed with pine nuts

shish_taouk.name: Shish Taouk
shish_taouk.desc: Chicken skewers marinated in lemon and garlic

baklava.name: Baklavas
baklava.desc: Pastries with nuts and pistachios, sugar syrup

knefeh.name: Knefeh
knefeh.desc: Angel hair, melted cheese, syrup, pistachios (served warm)

About.title: Our Story
About.history: FATTOUSH was born from the desire to share sincere, generous, and modern Lebanese cuisine, faithful to traditions while being part of Genevan life. We believe that every dish tells a story, that of our roots and our passion for hospitality.
